mapper.select: SELECT order_info.receive_user_nickname, order_info.receive_user_avatar, order_info.order_title, order_info.order_detail, order_info.pay_cost, order_info.deliver_cost, order_info.limit_time, order_tag.id as tag_id, order_tag.tag_name FROM order_info LEFT JOIN order_tag ON order_info.order_id = order_tag.order_id WHERE order_info.`status` = 1
